welcome_message_body: Welcome to Reno, where the beauty of the Sierra Nevada mountains meets the excitement of the Biggest Little City in the World. Enjoy our vibrant arts scene, lively casinos, and outdoor adventures â€“ we can't wait for you to experience it all!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights operated by major airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights operated by airlines such as Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, and Southwest.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport with a simple registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Truckee-Tahoe Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.
